trans-unit.source: Represents an <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that occurs when a workflow does not pass validation.
This class cannot be inherited.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException> represents an exception that occurs while validating the workflow when run using <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException"></xref> class.
The exception message is passed as a parameter.
The exception message.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException"></xref> class.
The exception message and the inner exception are passed as parameters.
The exception message.
The <xref href="System.Exception.InnerException"></xref> associated with this exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException"></xref> class.
The exception message and the errors collection are passed as parameters.
The exception message.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> associated with this exception.
Returns <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError"></xref>s that were obtained when creating/validating workflows.
An array that contains each <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError"></xref> that caused this exception.

Sets the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException"></xref>.
This method implements `ISerializable.GetObjectData`.
Reference to the object that holds the data needed to serialize and deserialize the exception.
Provides the means to serialize the exception data.
